Articles.Content:
hi.

I'm just poking at spaceplanes (oh the humanity... er, kerbality of my past attempts)

I dont have any mods at the moment

got looking at the mk3 pod, and how it has that big 'empty' nose... and the closest nose cap i can find is the aerodynamic nose cap... but it doesn't seem to 'match up'.

the NCS adaptor under structural looks like it fits... is there a nosecap that i'm missing or is there no 'good' way to nose off the mk3 pod at the moment?
Why not use a shielded docking port?
Whenever I try my hand at planes or space planes, I usually throw an ASAS plus either a docking port or flat intake on the front of that cockpit.

*blinks softly* I never thought to attach an asas to my plane. i'll have to see if I can squeeze one in behind the cockpit. I think I downgraded to a mark 2, since I disliked the weird look of the mark 3.
